definitions.definition: connected with beliefs and principles about what is right and wrong

examples.text: the ethical problems of human embryo research
She objected on purely ethical grounds.
Doctors were expected to draw up ethical guidelines regarding relationships with patients.
Our overseas suppliers are obliged to comply with certain ethical principles.
There's an overwhelming ethical argument for the protection of the environment.
What kind of ethical and political values underpin our society?

examples.text: Is it ethical to keep animals in zoos?
examples.contextForm: it is ethical to do something

examples.text: It would have been more ethical for him to resign.
examples.contextForm: it is ethical for somebody to do something

examples.text: **ethical investment** *(= investing money in businesses that are considered morally acceptable)*
I don't consider the arms trade to be an ethical one.
